Package sorcer.core.monitor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MonitoringManagement  
    MonitoringSession
    An interface for controlling the session in the server.
    MonitorManagement
    An interface to be implemented by a monitoring service.
    MonitorSessionManagement
    A server side session manager.
    MonitorUIManagement
    An interface for UI to interact with the monitor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MonitorableSession
    A proxy for controlling the session in the server.
    MonitorEvent
    Monitor Event is passed back by MonitorManager to notify the Service Broker about any monitoring events.
